title: Welcome!
text:
Step 1: Download the Data
The data we are going to use can be found at this link.


Step 2: Pick your Language

If you are going to follow the R sessions, please go here.
If you are going to follow the Python sessions, please go here.

title: R
text:
Step 3: Create an Account on Posit Cloud
Create an account at Posit Cloud.


Step 4: Load Your Data
Once you are inside your project click on Upload.

title: Python
text: In this page you can find instruction to setup your environment to follow Python sessions.
